title: Taormina Sicily Resort Romance on the Baia delle Sirene with Spa, Restaurant & Two Bars
description:
Elevated above the enchanting Baia delle Sirene and within the hilltop town of Taormina, this seaside resort is paradise on the Sicilian coast. Look out onto sapphire bay views from Nui Restaurant, serving traditional Sicilian dishes with a modern twist, and watch the sunset with a cocktail in hand at the pool or beach bar.

Regenerate with wellness treatments at Hyd’Or Wellness Centre, and further afar, discover the magic of Sicilly on a small boat tour to Catania and Ciclopi, tour the film sights of The Godfather and fall in love with the Greco-­Roman Taormina town.
offer_address: Via Nazionale, 161, 98030 Taormina Messina, Sicily, Italy
